body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation        The Hancock to Calumet streetcar. Keweenaw NHP archives.      Public transit and taxi services are listed here.     Daily scheduled air service is provided to the Houghton County Memorial Airport (CMX) by United Airlines. Rental cars are available at the airport and from auto dealers.Bike rentals are also available in downtown Calumet.       Bikes occupy the rack outside of the Calumet Visitor Center. NPS Photo
title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Public Transportation
